content: Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate is a synthetic ester that is typically used in cosmetic formulations as an emollient and skin conditioning agent. It is usually stable over a wide range of pH levels and is commonly used in formulations that range from pH 4 to 8. However, the optimal pH range for a specific formulation may depend on other ingredients and their interactions with Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate.
